Title: Super Watermelon Island
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Rita Rani Ahuja, Kimberly Brooks, Michaela Dietz
Plot: Using his Astral Projection ability, Steven discovers that Malachite is at Mask Island, where the remaining Watermelon Stevens have now taken up residence.
